text: [Music]
Michael Rockefeller had graduated from
Harvard and immediately signed up to be
the sound technician on a film in the
highlands of New Guinea and ethnographic
film about the donnie during a break in
the filming he went to the coast it
habited by people called the Asmat who
were amazing artists he and a dutch
anthropologist named Rene wah Singh who
had been assigned to him by the Dutch
government it was a Dutch colony at the
time
we're heading into southern as Matt a
region that had little contact with the
west and the outside world and they were
crossing the mouth of a river he just
took a wave over the stern the engine
went out the boat flipped over they
drifted for 24 hours and at the end of
that time Michael was impatient and he
strapped on to empty gasoline cans to
his waist and jumped in and said I think
I can make it and was never seen again
Michael Rock thought was not only the
son of one of the richest and most
powerful men in America he was the son
of the governor of the state of New York
it was front-page news and the governor
and Michael's twin sister Mary jumped on
an airplane flew to New Guinea and they
spent about two weeks as the Dutch
mounted a pretty wide-ranging and
frantic search despite such an intensive
search nothing was found the Dutch
declared the search over and Michael was
presumed to disappeared at sea this
early is March of 1962 the first rumours
hit The Associated Press wires that
Michael had in fact made to shore and
been attacked and consumed by men from
the village of ocean M to really
understand what happened I had to go to
as man I had to go to the villages that
Michael had been to spend ultimately
four months in Asmat I was bothered by
consistent reports that he had been
killed in retribution for a Dutch raid
that had taken place can we found
hundreds and hundreds of pages of
documents that had never been seen
before two priests in particular who
lived in the villages wrote
really detailed reports about his
disappearance I mean who had his head
who had his femur or who had his tibia
who had stabbed him who had speared him
and they had filed those reports to
their superiors in the Dutch government
in the Catholic Church the Dutch covered
it up because the very week that Michel
disappeared the Minister of Foreign
Affairs was presenting his case for
essentially retaining Papua as a colony
the whole plan was predicated on Papua
being this sort of civilized future
country in the making and the Dutch were
embarrassed that the son of the Governor
of New York had been killed and
cannibalized
there's no body there's no glasses I
don't think we'll ever find that though
it may seem strange to say it the
simplest explanation is that he made it
to shore and was killed by the Asthma
